channel.title: Looks Like Calling Andrew A Geek Wont Make Him Cry :(
channel.description:
Unfortunately I'm a bit of a computer geek, I'm not very good at PR :) (pretty obvious that!) People seem to think of me as some sort of corporate suit, and forget that I'm actually still a programmer who started this game as a hobby. I don't normally get involved in customer support or rules enforcement at all I try to stick to what I'm best at which is sitting in a darkened room and programming the game itself. My absolute aim above everything else is to make the best game I can.
I say money smoking/eating/drinking/licking/sucking person. He loves money like a fat person love cake.

His first one was saying he was going to sue someone for saying that they ban unfairly and they are very biased and the second was a thread saying sorry for saying he was gonna sue someone. Lmfao…[/quote]

item.title: Looks Like Calling Andrew A Geek Wont Make Him Cry :(
item.dc:creator: @BlackThursday BlackThursday
item.description:
@BlackThursday wrote:

[quote=“Mr.Chris, post:1, topic:4520”][quote]
Unfortunately I’m a bit of a computer geek, I’m not very good at PR (pretty obvious that!) People seem to think of me as some sort of corporate suit, and forget that I’m actually still a programmer who started this game as a hobby. I don’t normally get involved in customer support or rules enforcement at all I try to stick to what I’m best at which is sitting in a darkened room and programming the game itself. My absolute aim above everything else is to make the best game I can.[/quote]

I say money smoking/eating/drinking/licking/sucking person. He loves money like a fat person love cake.[/quote]

Ok… FLAME ON!!!

Starts on Fire

Lemme start like this. Gower is a good-for- nothing money hungary child moslesting piece of monkey shit.

Gower probly ripped this game off someone worse than IMPsoft ripped their bot (sry had to throw that in ).

Gower will NEVER have kids, a wife, happiness, a clean game with no l337 h4x0rs like us… of course. The only thing Andrew Gower can get is a handjob from a gay guy for 15 bucks in some back alley.

Fuck you Gower… Fuck You…
